This file contains SQLite3 related functions.

requires:NumPy
author:Sami-Matias Niemi
version:0.1

Functions

SSFR(mstardot, mstar) Calculates the specific star formation rate from a given (SAM) data.

get_data_sqlite(path, db, query) This function can be used to pull out data from an slite3 database.

get_data_sqliteSMNfunctions(path, db, query) Run an SQL query to a database with custom made functions “toPowerTen” and “janskyToMagnitude”.

toLogTen(value) Takes the 10th base logarithm of the given value.
toPowerTen(value) Raises the given value to a power of ten.
